summary: With the aid from a New York City policeman, a top immigrant cop tries to stop drug-trafficking and corruption by immigrant Chinese Triads, but things get complicated when the Triads try to bribe the policeman.
cast: Yun-Fat Chow|Mark Wahlberg|Ric Young|Paul Ben-Victor|Jon Kit Lee|Andrew Pang|Elizabeth Lindsey|Brian Cox|Byron Mann|Kim Chan|Bill MacDonald|Susie Trinh|Ho Chow|Olivia Yap|Lynda Chiu|Marie Matiko|Pak-Kwong Ho|Tim Progosh|Byron Lawson|Beau Starr|LeRoy Allen|Simon B. Cotter|Frank Pellegrino|Tovah Feldshuh|Tig Fong|Chuck Scarborough|Karen Huie|Mike Jung|Howard Hoover|Lucille Soong|Mark Williams|Alice Poon|Jason Ting|Arthur Lo|Alice Lee Chun|Ayumi Iizuka|Jung-Yul Kim|Peter Loung|Lili Salman
keywords: buddy cop|police detective|tough cop|two man army|police corruption
title: The Corruptor
